item.title: Ship Fast, Ship Often: Building a $5K Product Portfolio One Launch at a Time
item.description:
As software engineers, we understand that monolithic applications often become unwieldy and hard to maintain. Similarly, betting everything on a single product carries unnecessary risk. Today, I’m sharing my strategy to reach $5,000 monthly revenue through rapid development and launch of multiple focused software products.

The Multi-Product Strategy

Instead of spending months building one perfect solution, I’m taking inspiration from continuous deployment practices. The plan is to ship multiple smaller, focused products that each solve a specific problem. This approach allows for faster market validation and reduces the risk of spending too much time on ideas that might not resonate.
